title: Chat Application
description: Responsive user interface having features like signup, login, send friend request, accept friend request, chat, create and manage group, delete chat, leave groups, send attachments, notification, search friends, animation while user on other side typed on chat with current user. React, redux toolkit with material-ui was incorporated. Mongodb and Mongoose were used for data modeling, storage and retrieval JWT tokenization accompanied with Bcrypt ensured secure authentication. REST api were created for all visible functionalities.

title: Blogging Application
description: Developed a full stack blogging website with MERN stack with authentication and crud functionalities.

title: Fitness Application
description: A Fitness Application was built with python, Streamlit and PLSQL for providing user fitness suggestion.

title: Online Streaming Backend
description: Fully Functional server with Rest API for integrated twitter and youtube like platform

title: E-Commerce Application
description: This is fully functional e commerce application with admin dashboard and charts . This Application is built with SASS, React, Mongodb, node, express, redux and Typescript
